Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2011 10:53PM lindapearson2 wrote: Hello,  I am wondering if anyone has any experience with "Resveratrol?"  I am currently taking Evista and the Femara was too hard on me.  I keep hearing that Resveratrol is so good, but worried if it will in fact increase my estrogen.  Would love to hear any thoughts on this!
